translation.en: [Kirigan] On our maps, the Shadow Fold is a black stain.
translation.it: Sulle nostre mappe, la Faglia d'Ombra è una macchia nera.

translation.en: A scar that severs Ravka in two.
translation.it: Una cicatrice che taglia Ravka in due.

translation.en: It was created hundreds of years ago as an act of vengeance
translation.it: Venne creata centinaia di anni fa per vendetta

translation.en: by the Black Heretic.
A man who could summon shadow.
translation.it: Un uomo in grado di evocare l'ombra.

translation.en: He was among those rare souls, the Grisha,
translation.it: Era una delle rare anime, un Grisha,

translation.en: who could manipulate the elements of this world.
translation.it: capace di manipolare gli elementi di questo mondo.

translation.en: The Fold locked East Ravka away from the sea ports on the west.
translation.it: La Faglia escludeva Ravka Est dai porti di mare dell'Ovest.

translation.en: The east withered and became vulnerable to attack
translation.it: L'Est si indebolì, vulnerabile agli attacchi

translation.en: from enemy nations in the north and south.
translation.it: delle nazioni del Nord e del Sud.

translation.en: With their powers, only the Grisha were capable of crossing the Fold.
translation.it: Con i loro poteri, solo i Grisha erano in grado di attraversare la Faglia.

translation.en: They joined forces with the King in service to Ravka.
translation.it: Si misero al servizio del Re di Ravka.

translation.en: They became the lifeline between the two sides of our country.
translation.it: Divennero il collegamento tra le due parti del nostro Paese.

translation.en: But they were still hated
for the sins of the Black Heretic.
translation.it: per i peccati commessi dall'Eretico Nero.

translation.en: Sins felt most deeply by his descendants.
translation.it: Peccati sentiti più profondamente dai suoi discendenti.

translation.en: Old myths foretell of a Grisha never before seen.
translation.it: Gli antichi miti profetizzavano l'avvento di un Grisha speciale,

translation.en: One who could destroy the Fold, reunite Ravka
translation.it: in grado di distruggere la Faglia, riunire Ravka

translation.en: and redeem our people.
A Summoner of pure light.
And so we wait for the one who will deliver us
translation.it: E così attendiamo il Grisha che verrà a liberarci

translation.en: from the dark place we made in the world.
translation.it: dal luogo oscuro che abbiamo creato nel mondo.

translation.en: We wait
for the Sun Summoner.
[Alina] When I was young, I was afraid of the dark.
translation.it: Da piccola, avevo paura del buio.

translation.en: When I got older, I learned that darkness is a place,
translation.it: Con l'età, ho imparato che il buio è un luogo

translation.en: -and it's full of monsters. -[growling]
I live in East Ravka, but I've never been welcome here
translation.it: Vivo a Ravka Est, ma non sono mai stata la benvenuta qui,

translation.en: because I look like my mother, and she looked like the enemy.
translation.it: perché assomiglio a mia madre, e lei aveva il volto del nemico.

translation.en: Alina, how can you do that in here?
translation.it: Alina, come ci riesci qui sopra?

translation.en: Bumps help with texture.
The Fold looks different on mine.
translation.it: La Faglia nella mia è diversa.

translation.en: I need to get a better view from your country.
translation.it: Devo guardarla meglio dal tuo Paese.

translation.en: [man 1] She grew up here. Come on!
[man 2] The Shu Han didn't want her either.
translation.it: Neanche a Shu Han la volevano.

translation.en: Cartographers, listen up. We're almost there.
Pack up and be ready to leave.
And if you lose anything, you will not be getting a replacement.
translation.it: E, se perdete qualcosa, non vi verrà sostituito.

translation.en: [Alina] But they aren't the monsters. They're just boys.
translation.it: Ma non sono loro i mostri. Sono solo ragazzi.

translation.en: I learned about my true enemy when I was a child.
translation.it: Ho capito da bambina chi era il mio vero nemico.

translation.en: [young Alina] Is it real?
Of course it's real.
The Fold ate your parents.
translation.it: La Faglia ha inghiottito i tuoi genitori.

translation.en: It's the reason for many of the orphans here.
translation.it: DAI LIBRI DI LEIGH BARDUGO A questo si devono i tanti orfani.

translation.en: People trying to cross. Taunting the Saints.
translation.it: La gente tenta di attraversare sfidando i Santi.

translation.en: Then why cross it? Why not go around?
translation.it: E perché attraversano? Perché non fanno il giro?

translation.en: Read the map.
The north want our Grisha dead,
translation.it: Il nord vuole morti i nostri Grisha,

translation.en: the south guards its mountains.
translation.it: il sud protegge i suoi monti.

translation.en: We have nowhere else to go.
Now work on your shading, girl.
Keep a pencil in your hand.
Or else someone will put a rifle in it instead.
translation.it: o qualcuno la sostituirà con un fucile.

translation.en: [Alina] I spent years thinking I'd find a way out.
translation.it: Ho passato anni a credere che sarei riuscita

translation.en: Around the Fold, to go somewhere where no one cares where I'm from.
translation.it: ad aggirare la Faglia, arrivando dove il mio aspetto non conta.

translation.en: But now, I'm old enough to know the only way out is through.
translation.it: Ma ormai so che l'unico modo per andarmene da qui è attraversarla.

translation.en: We are never going to see it go away. This abomination is here forever.
translation.it: Non sparirà mai. Questo abominio resterà qui per sempre.

translation.en: You don't go to church.
A Saint who can summon the sun will destroy it.
translation.it: Un Santo che può evocare il sole la distruggerà.

translation.en: I'd like to see even one person who isn't scared of that.
translation.it: Vorrei conoscere qualcuno a cui non fa paura.

translation.en: [woman] I bet I know someone.
Mal. He isn't afraid of anything.
translation.it: Mal. Lui non ha paura di niente.

translation.en: [sighs] You'd be surprised.
[softly] Alina.
Look what I found.
-Where? -[young Mal] Little guy's lost.
But I found some chewed plants in the woods to the east.
translation.it: C'erano delle piante masticate nei boschi a est.

translation.en: I bet his warren's there.
Why you run from me, half-breed?
Stay away from him.
Or what? You going to draw me, rice eater?
Or I'll cut you.
-[footsteps approaching] -What's this?
Who's tracked in dirt on my rug? Mal Oretsev!
translation.it: Chi ha sporcato di terra il mio tappeto? Mal Oretsev!

translation.en: I know you're hiding here!
-Come out now! -No!
Can't hide forever.
Yes, I can!
All right, maybe you can.
But this is what you become!
translation.it: Ma è questo che vuoi diventare?

translation.en: A boy who hides from a fight!
translation.it: Uno che si nasconde di fronte a una sfida?

translation.en: Get very good at it, maybe you'll survive to see 20.
translation.it: Se diventi bravo a farlo, forse arriverai ai 20 anni.

translation.en: Bring me a big rabbit before the dinner bell goes.
translation.it: Portami un bel coniglio prima dell'ora di cena.

translation.en: Final bets! Final bets!
Keep it clean, boys, go on.
[man 1] Yes!
[man 2] Get stuck in there. Let's go! Come on!
It's all right, breathe. Breathe, here we go. Come on.
He'll be all right?
I'm sure we'll find out. Come on, hit him! Belt him.
He doesn't want it! Come on, chump! He doesn't want it!
[man 3] Hurt him, now! Hurt him!
[man 3] Come on, let's go! Let's go now! Let's have it. Come on!
translation.it: Dai, forza, andiamo! Dacci dentro. Vai!

translation.en: Lovely!
Yes! Yes!
You beauty!
My boy, Mal Oretsev, wins again! Who wants a go?
translation.it: Il mio Mal Oretsev vince di nuovo! Chi vuole sfidarlo?

translation.en: [man 4] I'll take a turn.
How about it? Just you and me.
translation.it: Che ne dici? Solo noi due.

translation.en: No, no, no.
If you lose, you'll be in the medika. If you win, they'll throw you in the brig.
translation.it: Se perdi, vai in ospedale. Se vinci, ti sbattono in prigione.

translation.en: Shut it down, boys! Shut it down!
You try me without that magic, huh?
It's just air.
Come on! Anyone!
When did you get in?
Yesterday. Everyone's getting their assignments.
translation.it: Da ieri. Stanno dando le assegnazioni.

translation.en: Suppose cartography's heading back south. [chuckling]
translation.it: Credo che i Cartografi tornino a sud.

translation.en: I found out 'cause they're putting my unit with yours again.
translation.it: Lo so, riuniscono la mia unità con la tua.

translation.en: They're looking for a way through the mountains.
Oh! So we're back together?
They can't keep best friends apart for too long.
translation.it: Non possono tenere gli amici lontani a lungo.

translation.en: Corporal Oretsev, are you saying you miss me?
Well, I need someone to take the fall for my petty crimes, that's all.
translation.it: Mi serve solo qualcuno da incolpare delle mie malefatte.

translation.en: -Oh, they moved our tent. -Yeah, it's down that end now.
translation.it: - Hanno spostato la nostra tenda. - Sì, è laggiù ora.

translation.en: [Alina] So many First Army here.
We look like a halfway house, accepting donations.
translation.it: Sembra un centro di recupero che accetta le donazioni.

translation.en: Actually, I won't be accepting any donations
-because I won this betting on a fight. -Huh?
translation.it: perché ho vinto scommettendo su un incontro.

translation.en: Look at you. Flush with five whole… kruge?
translation.it: Ma guardati, getti al vento cinque kruge.

translation.en: What will you do with foreign money? We're not in Ketterdam.
translation.it: Cosa fai con i soldi stranieri? Non siamo a Ketterdam.

translation.en: Don't crush my dreams.
[woman] Again! Inferni!
Nice. Nice. Good. Good. Again.
[Mal] This is why our tents got moved.
-[woman] Good. -Grisha wanted more space.
translation.it: - Bene. - I Grisha volevano più spazio.

translation.en: Ugh. Grisha.
Now. I'm going to do it again.
Show-offs.
[woman] Another Inferni and Squaller.
translation.it: Un altro Inferni e un Chiamatempeste.

translation.en: They're always picking on us when their general's not around.
translation.it: Fanno sempre i prepotenti quando non c'è il generale.

translation.en: It's like home all over again.
It wasn't all bad. We learned some good life lessons back then.
translation.it: Non era così male. Abbiamo imparato delle lezioni utili.

translation.en: [scoffs] Yeah? Care to share with the class?
One, don't cry in public.
Hide your emotional breakdown for when you're alone. Obviously.
translation.it: Tieniti i crolli emotivi per quando sei solo. Ovvio.

translation.en: -Two, always carry a weapon on you. -Always.
translation.it: - Secondo: porta sempre un'arma con te. - Sempre.

translation.en: There's a third I can't remember.
[soldier 1] Open her up, we're loading!
[Alina] That looks new.
Brand-new. Grisha call it ultralight.
translation.it: Nuovissima. I Grisha la definiscono ultraleggera.

translation.en: Made by their own Fabrikators. It's supposed to be faster.
translation.it: L'hanno fatta i loro Fabrikator. Dovrebbe essere più veloce.

translation.en: What happened to the last one?
Never came back.
-[man] There he is! -Here we go.
I would have made a killing on you,
translation.it: Avrei dovuto puntare su di te,

translation.en: but nah, he refused to loan me any money, so…
translation.it: ma lui non mi ha prestato i soldi e…

translation.en: That's because you're a child in a bigger child's body.
translation.it: Perché sei un bambino in un corpo minuto.

translation.en: -You're shorter than I am. -Okay. Dubrov, Mikhael, this is Alina.
translation.it: - Sei più basso di me. - Ok. Dubrov, Mikhael, lei è Alina.

translation.en: Your little friend from Keramzin? -[Dubrov] Ah… -This is her.
translation.it: La tua amichetta di Keramzin. È lei.

translation.en: -"Little friend"? -How is that wrong?
-He talks about you all the time. -What does he say?
translation.it: - Parla sempre di te. - E cosa dice?

translation.en: -[Mikhael] Oh, well… -Don't listen to these two.
They like to exaggerate. It's what they do.
-[chuckles] Look at him! -Oh, he's so easy to rile.
Is that annoying you?
Yeah? All right. Come on, you bastard.
-Come on, then. -[horn blaring]
-Saved by the horn, Mal. -[Mal] Oh, I wouldn't say so.
translation.it: - Ti ha salvato il suono del corno, Mal. - Non direi.

translation.en: What does he say about me?
All right, listen up.
I know some of you have been on the road for a week, so I'll be brief.
translation.it: Alcuni di voi sono in giro da una settimana. Sarò breve.

translation.en: Most of you will continue north to the Fjerdan frontlines.
translation.it: Molti proseguiranno a nord verso il fronte di Fjerda.

translation.en: Or south to the Shu Han border.
translation.it: O a sud al confine di Shu Han.

translation.en: The Second Army, however, has a shiny new solution to our food shortage,
translation.it: Ma il Secondo Esercito ha una soluzione nuova di pacca per la mancanza di cibo

translation.en: and it sails tomorrow for Novokribirsk.
If this model works,
it means a full meal for everyone in this tent next week.
translation.it: la prossima settimana avrete tutti un pasto completo…

translation.en: It means bullets for your guns and sugar for your tea.
translation.it: munizioni per le armi e zucchero per il tè.

translation.en: [soldier] How about some whiskey?
Yes, that would be nice, but don't hold your breath.
translation.it: Sì, sarebbe bello, ma non illudetevi.

translation.en: Of course, they need our help bringing those supplies back,
translation.it: Avranno bisogno del nostro aiuto per portare qui le scorte.

translation.en: so some of you will be assigned.
"There's nothing to fear."
"I will now be selecting names for what I call the 'nightmare lottery.'"
translation.it: Ora dirò i nomi della cosiddetta 'lotteria degli incubi'."

translation.en: For the supply run across the Fold!
translation.it: Attraverseranno la Faglia per le scorte di cibo:

translation.en: Sergeant Yure Teplov.
Tracker Malyen Oretsev!
Corporal Masyelentov!
Did he… But you're in our unit. -Rifleman Valek Tapenyov! -Uh…
translation.it: - Ha detto… Ma sei nella nostra unità. - Fuciliere Valek Tapenyov!

translation.en: It has to be an error. It has to be.
-Didn't sound like an error, Mal. -And finally, Medic Nolech Barenovsky.
translation.it: - Non sembra un errore, Mal. - E infine, dott. Nolech Barenovsky.

translation.en: That's it. Dinner in one hour.
translation.it: È tutto. Si cena tra un'ora.

translation.en: Come back and line up by rank. Dismissed.
translation.it: Mettetevi in fila per grado. Potete andare.

translation.en: Well, if it does work, I'll get to visit Ketterdam.
[woman] Come on, come on!
[gambler] Yes! I love it!
Darling, please. Drinks here. Drinks all round here, please.
translation.it: Tesoro, per favore. Porta da bere a tutti, qui.

translation.en: Hey, you take Zemeni coin, yes?
[man] Let me see that.
The Lucky Nine casino up the block
has had trouble with counterfeit coin lately.
translation.it: sono state date delle monete false.

translation.en: Heavy, but brittle.
Oh, come on, now. I've been here for hours.
translation.it: E dai. Sono qui da ore.

translation.en: My money is good, no?
Zemeni coin can take a bullet. But the knockoff…
translation.it: Le monete Zemeni sono antiproiettile, quelle finte…

translation.en: Busted.
What does that prove?
Hey! Wait! What are you doing?
Get off me!
No loud noises at the table, Jesper.
translation.it: Non far baccano al tavolo, Jasper.

translation.en: You'll scare off the pigeons.
Wouldn't want that, boss.
-Shouldn't you be on the door? -Yeah, right away, boss.
translation.it: - Perché non sei alla porta? - Vado subito.

translation.en: Early for action, innit, Kaz?
What do you want, Rotty?
Someone stole a DeKappel from a merch's private residence last night.
translation.it: Ieri sera hanno rubato un DeKappel dalla casa di un mercante.

translation.en: Is that so?
It's a painting.
A landscape of Ravka. The Fold. Oil on parchment.
translation.it: Un paesaggio di Ravka. La Faglia. Olio su pergamena.

translation.en: I know who DeKappel is.
Well, he don't do nudes, so I never heard of him.
translation.it: Non fa nudi, quindi io non lo conoscevo.

translation.en: Get to it, Rotty.
Worth something like 10,000 kruge.
The thief had to get past four roving guards,
translation.it: Il ladro ha superato quattro guardie,

translation.en: high fences, padlocked doors,
and a security system designed by one of them Grisha witches.
translation.it: e un sistema di sicurezza creato da un Grisha.

translation.en: -Fabrikator. -Whatever.
translation.it: Un Fabrikator. Comunque, il punto è che è stata opera di un gruppo o di un fantasma.

translation.en: The point is, either it was a group effort or a ghost.
translation.it: Comunque, il punto è che è stata opera di un gruppo o di un fantasma.

translation.en: Why does this concern me?
I've got a buyer lined up. Legit money.
So, uh… if you hear a whisper… [clicks tongue]
Who can hear a whisper here?
Hello, Inej.
What information do you have for me tonight?
A lead on a job. A big one. Enough money to change lives.
translation.it: Ho qualcosa su un lavoro grosso. Tanti soldi da cambiare vita.

translation.en: It doesn't take much to change someone's life in the Barrel.
translation.it: Non ci vuole molto a cambiare vita nel Barile.

translation.en: A million kruge?
What's the name?
Dreesen. A wealthy merchant.
I've heard of him.
He could afford it.
The question is, what's worth a million kruge to him?
translation.it: La domanda è: cosa vuole per un milione?

translation.en: He's looking for a crew willing to cross the Fold into East Ravka
translation.it: Persone disposte ad arrivare a Ravka Est attraverso la Faglia

translation.en: and bring back something.
The Fold?
Well, of course, certain death pays a million.
translation.it: Ovvio, la morte certa vale un milione.

translation.en: He didn't say what he wants nicked?
No.
But he's taking meetings tonight, starting at midnight.
translation.it: Ma stasera ascolterà gli interessati, dopo mezzanotte.

translation.en: Tell me you followed him.
He brought someone in from a ship.
Took a way back to his house in the Garden District to avoid attention.
translation.it: Per non farsi notare, è rientrato passando dal Quartiere dei Giardini.

translation.en: I would have followed him inside, but Dreesen's hired some private security.
translation.it: Lo avrei seguito dentro, ma Dreesen ha delle guardie private.

translation.en: I would have had to use my knives to get closer.
translation.it: Dovevo usare i coltelli per avvicinarmi.

translation.en: -[thunder rumbling] -Private security.
Anyone we know?
A Zemeni man. I think his name is Tendo. You know him?
translation.it: Uno Zemeni. Credo si chiami Tendo. Lo conosci?

translation.en: Yeah. He gambles at one of Pekka's clubs.
translation.it: Sì. Gioca d'azzardo in uno dei locali di Pekka.

translation.en: So I won't have leverage on him.
translation.it: Non posso far leva su di lui.

translation.en: But Pekka will.
Kaz, I got this lead from one of the girls at the Menagerie.
translation.it: Kaz, ho avuto una soffiata da una delle ragazze del Serraglio.

translation.en: They tell me things in case you'd buy them out, like you did with me.
translation.it: Me le danno per farsi comprare come hai comprato me.

translation.en: I didn't, I'm paying off your indenture.
translation.it: Non è così, ti sto riscattando.

translation.en: You know what I mean.
This one girl, Kesh, she has skill. She's like me.
translation.it: C'è una ragazza, Kesh, molto brava. È come me.

translation.en: I only invest in the one of a kind.
translation.it: Investo solo su una persona unica.

translation.en: She isn't like you.
No one is.
So? What's our move now?
translation.it: E allora? Che si fa adesso?

translation.en: You're the one of us who believes in a higher power.
translation.it: Tu sei quella che crede in un potere superiore.

translation.en: If we're going to survive a round trip through the Fold,
translation.it: Per andare e tornare attraversando la Faglia,

translation.en: we'll need a miracle or two.
What's a Shu girl doing here?
translation.it: Che ci fa qui una Shu?

translation.en: I'm Ravkan. On the cartography team.
She's half Shu. An orphan.
[line cook] Is that an answer?
Back of the line. Your friends, too.
translation.it: Tornate in fila. Tu e i tuoi amici.

translation.en: I don't know them.
Then you go. Come on!
[woman] You can get arrested for that.
Stealing from Second Army will get you thrown in a hole.
translation.it: Per furto al Secondo Esercito ti chiuderebbero dentro.

translation.en: Maybe you should arrest me.
Hang on.
Aren't you one of our escorts for the crossing?
That's right.
Well,
I don't mind sharing.
Well, it's not for me. It's for a friend.
translation.it: Non è per me. È per un'amica.

translation.en: Some of it's for me.
What's your name?
I'm Mal. I'm a tracker.
Zoya. I'm a Squaller.
When I get nerves the night before,
translation.it: Se la notte prima ho avuto paura,

translation.en: I like to have a good tumble with a stranger.
translation.it: mi piace spassarmela con un estraneo.

translation.en: Clears my head.
That's my remedy.
I should go.
You don't seem like the type who does what they should.
translation.it: Non sembri il tipo che obbedisce agli ordini.

translation.en: [sighs] I found you.
[Alina] You always do, somehow.
Well, it's not hard, you always perch.
translation.it: Non è difficile, sei sempre di vedetta.

translation.en: [scoffs] I'm brooding.
Well, I have something for you.
translation.it: Beh, ho una cosa per te.

translation.en: Where did you get these?
-I stole them. -From a Grisha tent? [laughs]
translation.it: - L'ho rubata. - Dalla tenda dei Grisha.

translation.en: I thought it would get me an invitation to jail,
but it just got me an invitation to tumble with a Grisha.
translation.it: invece sono stato abbordato da una Grisha.

translation.en: You tumbled a Grisha?
[chuckles] No. No, I just flirted with her.
Maybe she flirted with me.
translation.it: O lei ha flirtato con me.

translation.en: -Look, Grisha women scare me. Okay? -[chuckles]
translation.it: Le donne Grisha mi fanno paura. Ok?

translation.en: Did you see the lieutenant?
Yeah.
And?
Well…
turns out they do need me. So…
translation.it: a quanto pare hanno bisogno di me, perciò…

translation.en: So…
I could shoot you in the foot.
-You're a terrible shot. -[chuckles]
Don't cross it.
When I was young,
I had nightmares about it.
Going in.
Finding my parents…
still dead.
Waiting for me.
-Well, orders are orders. -[scoffs]
If it goes wrong, come back. You've lost enough to it already.
translation.it: Se va male, torna indietro. Hai già sacrificato troppo.

translation.en: I'll find my way back to you.
Promise.
But first, I am going gambling in Ketterdam.
translation.it: Ma, prima, andrò a giocare d'azzardo a Ketterdam.

translation.en: [chuckling] Without me?
I'll write you a letter.
[Kaz] Tell us how to safely cross the Fold.
The Fold?
If I knew safe passage through that,
I'd be wealthier than the whole Merchant Council.
translation.it: sarei più ricca di tutti i mercanti.

translation.en: You told me you brought in girls from Os Alta. The other side.
translation.it: Mi hai detto che hai portato qui delle ragazze da Os Alta.

translation.en: Yeah. The hard way. Lost a few to those damn volcra, too.
translation.it: Sì. Nel modo peggiore. Ne ho persi alcuni per via dei Volcra.

translation.en: Nah, there's no trick to it
except how it makes people disappear from time to time.
translation.it: se non che ogni tanto fa sparire qualcuno.

translation.en: I heard you bragging of a way to make a path.
translation.it: Ti vantavi di conoscere un passaggio.

translation.en: I was taking kruge from a tourist. A little lie.
translation.it: Era una bugia per spillare soldi a un turista.

translation.en: The Fold keeps those Ravkan bastards and their Grisha attack dogs in check.
translation.it: La Faglia tiene a freno quei bastardi di Ravka e i loro Grisha.

translation.en: Can you imagine how dangerous it would be if it wasn't there?
translation.it: Pensa quanto sarebbe pericoloso se non ci fosse.

translation.en: [man] Just go around.
It stretches all the way north to the Fjerdan border.
translation.it: Si estende a nord fino al confine con Fjerda.

translation.en: Ja. So go to Fjerda. March through the permafrost.
translation.it: Ja. E voi andate a Fjerda. Attraversate il Permafrost.

translation.en: How long would that take?
From here? Four months.
Maybe five.
We don't have that kind of time.
Either you take your time or you take your chances.
translation.it: O ci mettete più tempo o rischiate.

translation.en: Here's what I don't get.
-We're going to be here all night. -Rude.
translation.it: - Ci vorrà tutta la notte. - Sgarbata.

translation.en: Why haven't they tried going under it? Just dig a tunnel.
translation.it: Perché non provare a passarci sotto scavando un tunnel?

translation.en: Tried that. More than a century ago.
translation.it: Già provato. Più di un secolo fa.

translation.en: Something… heard them digging.
It was made hundreds of years ago by that crazy Grisha…
translation.it: Fu fatto secoli fa da quel folle Grisha…

translation.en: The Black Heretic.
The one who controls shadow. They've got one in their army now.
translation.it: Quello che controlla l'ombra. Ora ne hanno uno nell'esercito.

translation.en: General Kirigan?
[Inej] Your point?
[Jesper] If one of his kind made it, can't he unmake it?
translation.it: Se uno come lui l'ha creata, lui non può disfarla?

translation.en: Have you ever put out fire by adding more fire?
translation.it: Hai mai spento un fuoco con altro fuoco?

translation.en: Then what's the opposite?
-A Sun Summoner. -[Jesper] Right, then, one of those.
Doesn't exist.
Doesn't exist yet.
Dreesen comes into town, doesn't waste a minute.
translation.it: Se Dreesen viene in città, non perde tempo.

translation.en: Sends out for a crew to steal something but doesn't specify what.
translation.it: Manda i suoi a rubare qualcosa, ma non dice cosa.

translation.en: Is it heavy, large, worth more than a million on the black market?
translation.it: È pesante, grande e vale oltre un milione al mercato nero.

translation.en: Maybe he doesn't know.
We can let this one go, Kaz.
-Sounds like a trap, anyway. -[Kaz] A trap would sound easy.
translation.it: - Sembra una trappola. - Una trappola sarebbe facile.

translation.en: This is something else.
[man] Boss, boss.
We intercepted a note from Dreesen.
translation.it: Abbiamo captato un messaggio da Dreesen.

translation.en: Did you, now?
It's for the owner of the Orchid.
Says they require the services of a Heartrender. Tonight.
translation.it: Richiedono i servizi di uno Spaccacuore. Stanotte.

translation.en: A Heartrender? Why?
Doesn't say. Just they need it before midnight.
translation.it: Non l'hanno detto. Ma serve prima di mezzanotte.

translation.en: You don't bring in a Heartrender
unless you need an answer out of someone who isn't willing to talk.
translation.it: ti serve una risposta da qualcuno che non vuole parlare.

translation.en: That's how we get this job before anyone else.
translation.it: Così otterremo il lavoro prima degli altri.

translation.en: Bring Dreesen a Heartrender.
[man] Boss, just one problem.
Pekka Rollins knows.
[chuckles] Pekka Rollins.
So, you know who I am. That makes things easier.
translation.it: Quindi sai chi sono. Questo facilita le cose.

translation.en: [man] You lead the Dime Lions.
My men tell me that you run this club.
translation.it: Mi hanno detto che gestisci tu questo locale.

translation.en: I do. [wheezing]
And the brothel next door.
-The Orchid. -That's right.
Fine girls there. Boys, too. Whatever you like.
translation.it: Belle ragazze. E anche bei ragazzi. Per tutti i gusti.

translation.en: Abram, get in here!
Hmm. Abram wouldn't let us talk, so we did the other thing.
translation.it: Abram non ci lasciava parlare, così abbiamo agito.

translation.en: I'll jump straight to it. I'm in a bit of a rush.
translation.it: Vado al dunque. Sono un po' di fretta.

translation.en: I'm in need of a Heartrender tonight for a million-kruge job.
translation.it: Mi serve uno Spaccacuore per un lavoro da un milione di kruge.

translation.en: And you got one. At the Orchid.
translation.it: E tu nei hai una. All'Orchidea.

translation.en: [man] You want Milana, then.
I can get you a good rate for her by the hour…
translation.it: Posso farti un buon prezzo all'ora…

translation.en: No, no, I'm not renting her.
translation.it: No, non la voglio in affitto.

translation.en: It's for a job.
If I bring her back, she'll tell you about the job.
translation.it: Se te la riporto, te ne parlerà

translation.en: Next thing you know, everyone is talking about the job.
[breathing heavily] My indentures are discreet.
[Pekka] Hmm. Because they work for you, right?
So here's the deal.
Work for me,
give over this dump and the Orchid,
then I'll give you 10% of whatever business comes in.
translation.it: e ti darò il 10% di ogni lavoro.

translation.en: [chuckling] That's a shit deal. I already get 100%.
translation.it: È un accordo di merda. Io ho il 100% ora.

translation.en: [Pekka] Yeah, okay.
The other option is…
I'll carve you up
and leave you in a barrel for the rats.
translation.it: e ti lasci in un barile per i ratti.

translation.en: So…
how about ten?
Cheer up, Dubrov.
The Black General's here to save the day.
translation.it: Il Generale Nero è qui per risolvere le cose.

translation.en: Oh, is he going to tear down the Fold?
No, I was being sarcastic.
He's a Grisha, not a miracle-worker.
translation.it: È un Grisha, non uno che fa miracoli.

translation.en: Is it him?
General Kirigan.
The leader of the Second Army here to grace us with his presence?
translation.it: Il leader del Secondo Esercito ci onora della sua presenza?

translation.en: He must believe the new skiff will be a shining success.
translation.it: Forse crede che la nuova nave sarà un successo.

translation.en: [man] Or a spectacular failure.
-Alexei. -[Alexei] What?
Sorry, Mal.
Do you think he's coming with us?
If he does, then you know what he believes.
translation.it: Se è così, sai cosa crede.

translation.en: Are we children, or are we soldiers?
Get to your posts and pack your gear. Skiff launches in 20.
translation.it: Ai vostri posti, preparatevi. Si salpa tra 20 minuti.

translation.en: Sergeant, get your crew ready!
Mal, you're with me, son. Chin up.
translation.it: Mal, tu sei con me. Coraggio.

translation.en: I've crossed it three times without incident.
translation.it: L'ho attraversata tre volte senza problemi.

translation.en: You'll get your first soon enough.
translation.it: Tra poco ne avrai uno anche tu.

translation.en: I'll be back before you know it.
And I'll be here the whole time.
Me and the cartographers, I mean.
[young Alina] We can't hide forever.
We can run. Together.
Petya, how did this happen?
We don't know. We were extra careful to secure all the lanterns.
translation.it: Non si sa. Abbiamo legato tutte le lanterne con attenzione.

translation.en: -And what was damaged? -Nothing major.
translation.it: - Cosa si è danneggiato? - Niente di che.

translation.en: Just some records of the western coast line,
translation.it: Solo dei dati sulla costa ovest,

translation.en: Os Kervo and the river system that runs through it.
translation.it: su Os Kervo e i fiumi che la attraversano.

translation.en: -It's really not… -Critical?
Geographical data of the territory on the other side of the damn Fold?
translation.it: I dati geografici sul territorio al di là della Faglia?

translation.en: Those records?
Yes, but I'm sure that the First Army on the other side has an--
translation.it: Sì, ma di sicuro il Primo Esercito dall'altra parte ha…

translation.en: You think I trust anyone else's intel?
translation.it: Pensi che mi fidi dei dati di altri?

translation.en: Now someone will have to cross the Fold, to redraw these maps.
translation.it: Bisognerà attraversare la Faglia e ridisegnare le mappe.

translation.en: I'll go. Put me on the skiff, I'll go.
translation.it: Vado io. Mi faccia partire con la nave.

translation.en: Yes. You will.
Your whole unit will.
I don't understand. We were going south, now we're going west?
translation.it: Non capisco. Andavamo a sud e ora andiamo a ovest?

translation.en: -What did you do? -Nothing.
Leave her alone, Raisa. You want everything to be her fault.
translation.it: Lasciala stare, Raisa. Dai sempre la colpa a lei.

translation.en: I'm usually right.
-[Alina gasps] -What the hell are you doing here?
-We've been assigned with you. -No. Turn around right now.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo venire con voi. - No. Torna indietro.

translation.en: Orders are orders.
I could shoot you in the foot.
I like my feet, thank you.
-Tell them you're too sick to go. -I'm never that sick.
translation.it: - Di' loro che stai male. - Non sto mai male.

translation.en: Lie if you have to.
And what's your lie? I'm with you.
translation.it: E tu non menti? Vengo con te.

translation.en: Get off this boat now, or I'll carry you off.
translation.it: Scendi o ti porto giù di peso.

translation.en: [Sergeant Yure] Raise the gate!
Ready to lock up.
I'll make it, promise.
Sergeant! What now?
The Grisha will tell us.
Not her. The Inferni.
[claps hands] Here's how it goes. We go into the Fold,
it gets dark, but we like it dark.
translation.it: sarà buio, ma a noi va bene

translation.en: That keeps us from drawing attention.
That's how we travel.
The only light we use is the blue one at the mast.
translation.it: L'unica luce che useremo è quella blu dell'albero.

translation.en: It's weak but safe.
[Raisa] But you're an Inferni, right?
Why are you here if we're supposed to keep things dark?
translation.it: Perché sei qui, se dobbiamo restare al buio?

translation.en: For when the dark comes to keep you.
translation.it: Per quando il buio verrà a prendervi.

translation.en: Where's your general? Kirigan?
[sailor] Ready for launch!
That's our cue.
Right, listen to me, cartographers.
Until we reach the western dry docks,
translation.it: Finché non arriveremo ai moli occidentali,

translation.en: you are to remain at your station.
Do not, I repeat, do not leave the skiff during the crossing.
translation.it: Ripeto, non lasciate la nave durante la traversata.

translation.en: In we go.
Marker one.
How many more are there?
Thirty-seven.
-Blow it out! What are you doing? -[creature growling]
What do we--
Come at me! Come at me, you coward!
[Alina] Alexei, no!
[mouthing] Mal!
I'll meet you at the meadow.
General Zlatan. Your orders?
translation.it: Generale Zlatan. Quali sono i suoi ordini?

translation.en: It's been too long.
They should have emerged two hours ago.
[soldier] Sir! Look!
Where is the rest of your crew?
So…
new management, gents.
Here's the deal.
The Heartrender is gone, boss.
Someone else got her.
Who?
I really appreciate new business,
but you've only paid for an hour of my time,
translation.it: ma mi ha pagato solo per un'ora

translation.en: and I have to be back at the Orchid.
[Kaz] The Orchid isn't safe tonight. Your life's in danger with this job.
translation.it: L'Orchidea non è sicura stasera. Ora sei in pericolo.

translation.en: Make yourself scarce for a few days afterwards.
translation.it: Cerca di sparire per qualche giorno.

translation.en: Mr. Brekker, are you threatening me? Really?
Even if I'm nice, my boss will call the stadwatch on you.
translation.it: Il mio capo la denuncerà alla stadwatch.

translation.en: It's not me you're in danger with. It's Pekka Rollins.
translation.it: Non è in pericolo con me, ma con Pekka Rollins.

translation.en: My boss would call the stadwatch on him as well.
translation.it: Il mio capo denuncerà anche lui.

translation.en: Which is why your boss is already dead.
translation.it: Per questo il suo capo è già morto.

translation.en: -[man] Who are you lot? -We're here to see Dreesen.
[man] You're not with Pekka's crew.
translation.it: Non siete con gli uomini di Pekka.

translation.en: And you're not in Pekka's pocket anymore if you don't owe him.
translation.it: E voi non dipendete più da lui.

translation.en: Hey, where did you get that coin?
translation.it: Ehi, da dove hai preso quella moneta?

translation.en: [man] Hey! One of these has a hole in it!
translation.it: Ehi! Una di queste ha un buco!

translation.en: Saints.
-Inside. Inside. -[laughing]
One look and I can tell. Criminals.
translation.it: Lo capisco al primo sguardo. Criminali.

translation.en: I'm not meeting anyone 'til midnight.
translation.it: Non vedrò nessuno fino a mezzanotte.

translation.en: We heard you needed a Heartrender.
All right, she stays, the rest of you, out.
translation.it: Ok, lei può restare. Voi, fuori.

translation.en: She stays.
And we have an exclusive on this job.
translation.it: E noi abbiamo l'esclusiva sul lavoro.

translation.en: Mr. Brekker.
No businessman worth his salt hires his first applicant.
translation.it: Nessun uomo d'affari assume il primo che si offre per un lavoro.

translation.en: [Kaz] No. No, I understand.
Of course, I will have to report you to the guild
for kidnapping and harboring a prisoner without chain of title.
translation.it: per rapimento e per aver nascosto un prigioniero.

translation.en: You wouldn't.
No businessman worth his salt
bargains for what he can take.
translation.it: tratta per ciò che può prendersi.

translation.en: I have to be back in an hour.
All right, come on.
Who's this?
So you don't know everything after all.
translation.it: Perciò in fondo non sapete tutto.

translation.en: This…
is Alexei Stepanov.
Two weeks ago, young Alexei here
translation.it: Due settimane fa, il giovane Alexei

translation.en: crossed through the Fold on foot.
translation.it: ha attraversato la Faglia a piedi.

translation.en: Alone.
How?
They're keeping it quiet,
but allegedly -he was one of a few witnesses to… -[water pouring]
translation.it: ma pare che sia stato uno dei pochi testimoni di…

translation.en: …an event.
[Alexei] Water.
What kind of event?
[Dreesen] I know an expedition was swarmed by volcra.
translation.it: So che una spedizione è stata attaccata dai Volcra.

translation.en: Should've been a total loss,
but something happened.
Some device detonated.
Obliterated the volcra,
lit up the dark like a forest fire.
translation.it: e ha illuminato il buio come un incendio.

translation.en: I know it wasn't a fire or else no one would have survived.
translation.it: RAVKA EST Non è stato un incendio. Non sarebbe sopravvissuto nessuno.

translation.en: [Dreesen] This was some invention no one had seen before.
translation.it: È un'invenzione che non nessuno ha mai visto.

translation.en: [Zoya] Healer!
He knows.
But he doesn't seem to be able to articulate his account of events.
translation.it: Ma non è in grado di raccontare gli eventi.

translation.en: Some form of traumatic lapse.
translation.it: Una specie di vuoto di memoria dovuto al trauma.

translation.en: So…
[Milana] You're safe now.
Now you can just speak
and I will just listen.
All right.
Tell me what happened in the Fold.
What saved you?
[Alexei] You won't believe me, but…
it was a Sun Summoner.
Who was it?
If I tell you, you'll set me free?
You have my word. I'll set you free.
translation.it: Hai la mia parola. Sarai libero.

translation.en: You're in Ketterdam now, Alexei.
You can go anywhere in the world from here.
translation.it: Da qui puoi andare in tutto il mondo.

translation.en: Just imagine.
Come on.
Her name is…
[Dreesen] Alina Starkov?
Good boy.
Show me the manifest.
Perfect.
You'll set me free now?
Thank you. Of course.
We are now the only people west of the Fold with this information.
translation.it: Ora siamo gli unici a ovest della Faglia a saperlo.

translation.en: My ship sails for West Ravka at dawn.
translation.it: La mia nave salperà all'alba verso Ravka Ovest.

translation.en: If you can prove that you have a way through the Fold and back,
translation.it: Se mi dimostra di poter attraversare la Faglia e tornare,

translation.en: I'll put you on that ship with an advance.
translation.it: la farò salire sulla nave in anticipo.

translation.en: If you don't, I'm giving this job to Pekka Rollins.
translation.it: Se no, affiderò il lavoro a Pekka Rollins.

translation.en: Give me a day. I'll have a plan.
translation.it: Mi dia un giorno. Ho un piano.

translation.en: You have until sunrise,
then your ship will have sailed, Mr. Brekker.
translation.it: poi la nave salperà, sig. Brekker.

translation.en: The prize is one million kruge.
translation.it: Il compenso è un milione di kruge.

translation.en: Now bring me Alina Starkov.
